hits.name: Half Cup
hits.address: 100-102 Judd St, Kings Cross, London WC1H 9NT, United Kingdom

hits.name: TY Seven Dials
hits.address: 7 Upper St Martin's Ln, London WC2H 9DL, United Kingdom

hits.name: Gale's
hits.address: 33-35 Exmouth Market, Farringdon, London EC1R 4QL, United Kingdom

hits.name: Look Mum No Hands!
hits.address: 49 Old St, London EC1V 9HX, United Kingdom

hits.name: The CoffeeWorks Project
hits.address: 235 Blackfriars Rd, London SE1 8BF, United Kingdom

hits.name: F Mondays
hits.address: 112A Brixton Hill, London SW2 1AH, United Kingdom

hits.name: Harris + Hoole - Fitzrovia
hits.address: 136-138 New Cavendish St, Fitzrovia, London W1W 6YD, United Kingdom

hits.name: Prufrock Coffee
hits.address: 23-25 Leather Ln, Holborn, London EC1N 7TE, United Kingdom

hits.name: Hanbury Hall
hits.address: 22 Hanbury St, Spitalfields, London E1 6QR, United Kingdom

hits.name: Le Pain Quotidien
hits.description: While it is known for being a popular brunch spot, this location has a space in the back and front which allows a nice environment for anyone looking to work here. The wifi is reliable and the natural light coming in makes it lovely to work.

hits.name: Satan's Coffee
hits.description: A cafe that's central but away from tourists. There's an area for working and an area for groups to chat in the back which makes it a great spot to work for long hours.
hits.address: Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes, 700, 08010 Barcelona

hits.name: Black Remedy
hits.description: This open space has a dedicated section for those who want to work (with or without a laptop). However their free wifi is limited to 2 hours.

hits.name: Espai Joliu
hits.description: A small and intimate cafe with a great selection of coffee and bakery items. There's one large table reserved for whoever wants to work in this space.

hits.name: Caffeine BCN
hits.description: This is an independent cafeteria in Poblenou with such a lovely atmosphere. Their space is fairly small but there's so much natural light that it feels quite open. ?

hits.name: Cafeteria La Impresion
hits.description: This cosy cafe is the perfect place for intensive or focused work. Quiet, comfortable and access to big tables and sockets.

hits.name: Departure Coffee Co
hits.description: You'll find a nice ambience in this cafe. But if you come here, come ready with a pair of headphones to block out the noise of the music and people.
hits.address: Carrer de la Verge, 1, 08001 Barcelona, Spain

hits.name: Hidden Cafe
hits.description: It has a vibrant atmosphere with people coming to hang out, grab and go, do some work or have some lunch. While it's a fairly small space, it's very versatile in the arrangement.?
hits.address: C/ Constança esquina Déu i Mata, 08029 Barcelona

hits.name: Brooklyn Cafe
hits.description: The spacious interior is very comfortable. They have such a calm atmosphere in there even with many people coming in and out to grab a coffee and ready-made poke or sandwiches for lunch.

hits.name: Cups & Coffee
hits.description: This is the definition of a cosy open space. Being enclosed in windows lets so much light into the space and makes it feel so much bigger. It's such a nice place to work in.

hits.name: People Cafe
hits.description: They're located on Gran Via just seconds away from Metro Urgell. You'll see less tourists and more locals sitting out with their laptops which makes it an ideal spot for some focused working time. The space stretches out to the back and they have a small mezzanine near the front with great natural light
hits.address: Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes, 511, 08015 Barcelona

hits.name: Madness Coffee
hits.description: It's right by The World Trade Center so it's not a very touristic area. It has a big open space with different seating options to choose from.
hits.address: Moll de Barcelona, s/n Terminal Norte local, 08039 Barcelona

hits.name: Eroica Caffe
hits.address: Carrer del Consell de Cent, 350, 08009 Barcelona

hits.name: Rustico
hits.description: While it's located very central in the city, it's surprisingly very calm inside as many people sit out on the terrace so you can sit indoors and get on with work!

hits.name: Cactus Cafe
hits.address: Carrer de Blasco de Garay, 10, 08004 Barcelona

hits.name: Morrow Coffee
hits.description: While their space is fairly small, the large windows letting in all the natural light makes it feel very open. They space is on a corner so they have a window table that wraps around the front and two large high tables that are ideal for working on.
hits.address: Av. Gran Vía de les Corts Catalanes 403 Barcelona, Spain, 08015 Barcelona

hits.name: FabCafe
hits.description: This is an open, spacious cafe in the front with a co-working space in the back. You can choose to work inside in the quieter periods or outside if it's a bit busier.

hits.name: Somewhere Cafe
hits.description: Somewhere Cafe is more than a brunch spot. The space is nice and open with different sized tables to choose from.

hits.name: Federal Cafe
hits.description: A popular brunch spot for tourists but with a large table for anyone wanting to work. Outlets are readily availble and you're able to stay as long as you like when ordering.

hits.name: Sweetaly
hits.description: A cosy cafe-gelateria hybrid with comfortable chairs, good sized tables for your notebooks, laptop and coffee!
hits.address: Ronda de Sant Pau, 39, 08015 Barcelona, Spain

hits.name: Delabuela
hits.description: A cosy, apartment-like cafe/restaurant that's quiet during the days. A range of chairs, tables and sofas to choose from, you can find a comfortable spot next to a power outlet and a nice beverage.
hits.address: Carrer del Comte Borrell, 8, 08015 Barcelona, Spain
